FFmpegOptions.CustomCommands: -rtbufsize 150M -f gdigrab -framerate 20 -offset_x 0 -offset_y 0 -video_size 1920x1080 -draw_mouse 1 -i desktop -f dshow -i audio="Microphone Array (Realtek(R) Audio)" -c:v libx264 -r 20 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -crf 28 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -ac 2 -b:a 128k -y "output.mp4"
